title: How to Make a Cucumber and Cress Salad

steps.headline: Pare the cucumbers and cut them into quarters and then into small pieces.
Pick over, wash and drain the fresh cress.
Add the cucumbers to the cress.
Mix and turn the cucumbers and cress into a salad bowl.
Pour over the French dressing, made with a little tarragon vinegar.
steps.description: Sprinkle over some lemon juice if wished.

steps.headline: Prepare the salad ingredients.
Mix the vinegar and olive together with a whisk.
Add the celery and cucumber to the salad bowl.
steps.description: Pour in the vinegar mixture and toss to cover.

steps.headline: Add the mint leaves and watercress.
Scatter the crumbled feta across the top of the salad.

text:
Cucumber and cress salad Pare the cucumbers and cut them into quarters and then into small pieces. Pick over, wash and drain the fresh cress. Dry in a clean cloth. Add the cucumbers to the cress. Mix and turn the cucumbers and cress into a salad bowl. Pour over the French dressing, made with a little tarragon vinegar. Sprinkle over some lemon juice if wished. Cucumber, cress and feta salad Prepare the salad ingredients. Dice the celery into 1/2 inch/1.5cm pieces. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/02/Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/02/Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Peel the cucumber, remove the seeds and dice into 1/2 inch/1.5cm pieces. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/14/Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet2.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/14/Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet2.jpg/v4-759px-Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Trim the mint leaves off the stalk and slice thinly. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5f/Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet3.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet3.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5f/Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet3.jpg/v4-759px-Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Cut the watercress leaves off the stems. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/46/Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet4.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet4.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/46/Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet4.jpg/v4-759px-Make-a-Cucumber-and-Cress-Salad-Step-6Bullet4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Mix the vinegar and olive together with a whisk. Season to taste with salt. Add the celery and cucumber to the salad bowl. Pour in the vinegar mixture and toss to cover. Add the mint leaves and watercress. Toss gently. Scatter the crumbled feta across the top of the salad. Season with pepper to taste. Serve immediately. Finished.
